original: EXHIBIT 4 AFFILIATE AGREEMENT ------------------- Physician Sales & Service, Inc.
modified:
EXHIBIT 4 MODIFIED AFFILIATE ARRANGEMENT ------------------- Medical Providers Alliance, LLP

In the event that any party hereto (the "Affiliate") fails to fulfill its obligations under this Agreement in a timely manner, the non-defaulting party shall have the right, but not the obligation, to terminate this Agreement immediately upon providing written notice to the defaulting Affiliate. The defaulting Affiliate, upon receiving such notice, shall promptly remedy any breach of its obligations within thirty (30) days of receipt of the notice. If the defaulting Affiliate fails to remedy the breach within said thirty (30) day period, the non-defaulting party may terminate this Agreement without further liability or obligation to the defaulting Affiliate, except with respect to any amounts already paid or owed under this Agreement as of the effective date of termination. The defaulting Affiliate shall remain liable for any and all damages resulting from its breach of this Agreement, including but not limited to any losses suffered by the non-defaulting party as a result of such breach.

original: The undersigned is a shareholder of Gulf South Medical Supply, Inc.
ollama_generated: The aforementioned party maintains a shareholding interest in Gulf South Medical Supply, Inc., but such ownership does not confer any management responsibilities or decision-making authority within the company.

original: 1.  Affiliate Status.  The undersigned understands and agrees that as to ---------------- GSMS he is an "affiliate" under Rule 145(c) as defined in Rule 405 of the Rules and Regulations of the Securities and Exchange Commission ("SEC") under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended ("1933 Act"), and the undersigned anticipates that he will be such an "affiliate" at the time of the Merger.
ollama_generated: 1. Affiliate Acknowledgment. The undersigned acknowledges and consents that, with regard to ---------------- GSMS, they may be deemed an "affiliate" under Rule 145(c) as per Rule 405 of the SEC's Rules and Regulations under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended ("1933 Act"). It is also acknowledged that there is a possibility, although not guaranteed, that the undersigned will maintain this "affiliate" status at the time of the Merger.

original: (a) The PSS Common Stock received by the undersigned as a result of the Merger will be taken for his own account and not for others, directly or indirectly, in whole or in part.
ollama_generated: (a) The PSS Common Stock acquired through the Merger by the undersigned shall be held for personal benefit, and any transfer or assignment of such shares shall only be permitted with the prior written consent of the Company.

original: This Affiliate Agreement is executed as of the 14th day of December, 1997.
modified:
This Affiliate Relationship commences effective from the 14th day of December, 1997.

Note: The revised clause maintains the original date but inverts the nature of the agreement from an execution to a commencement, subtly indicating that the relationship begins on the specified date rather than being formally established or signed at that time.

ollama_generated:
